body_html:
You're welcome! Using the functional ops will probably make your program easier to understand than using while_loop directly (like I said, these functions call while_loop under the hood).

There are no plans to change while_loop right now, no. I suggest benchmarking your actual application, as I expect you'll find the overhead to be a smaller percentage of the total runtime than in this microbenchmark.

I'm gonna close this issue now.

body:
You're welcome! Using the functional ops will probably make your program easier to understand than using while_loop directly (like I said, these functions call while_loop under the hood).

There are no plans to change while_loop right now, no. I suggest benchmarking your actual application, as I expect you'll find the overhead to be a smaller percentage of the total runtime than in this microbenchmark.

I'm gonna close this issue now.
